### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#10973](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/10973.html) (Refactor: separate wallet from node by ryan
nit: I suspect this and below won't be particularly helpful if included in the doxygen output
I think it is helpful to describe the long term goal better (and give ideas to work on for new contributors)

re: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15531#discussion_r262466357

> nit: I suspect this and below won't be particularly helpful if included in the doxygen output 

I don't know if this is a formatting suggestion or a content suggestion. It would help if you could be more specific. I've seen links posted to bitcoin doxygen output once in a while, but I've haven't used the doxygen out
